page.title: 13Poringland Education
page.content: There are 2 schools in Poringland,a junior school and a high school.The junior school has 220 pupils of ages 4-12.The uniform colours are blue, grey,black and white.It is not a strict uniform.It is a close-knit community and is valued highly by the neighbourhood.Framingham Earl high School has 700 pupils of ages 6-12 drawn from the area around.The uniform is strict,the colours are dark and light,blue and grey.The pupils like the school.Their favourite subject is Design for Living and their worst is Religious Education.For further education the pupils are moved to a school or college elsewhere,usually in Norwich.
